headline: Visa (NYSE:V) Partners With Extend To Empower Emerging Middle-Market Companies With Virtual Cards
summary: Visa (NYSE:V) experienced a 7% price increase in the last quarter. This movement follows several key developments, including a referral agreement with Extend to enhance Visa's service offerings through virtual cards. Additionally, Visa's robust Q1 earnings results, showcasing sales and net income growth, may have bolstered investor confidence. The company's effective share repurchase program also likely contributed to the positive sentiment. Meanwhile, external market factors, such as the...

headline: 2 Top Buffett Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Long Haul
summary: Warren Buffett is arguably the best-known person in investing.  With that type of success, it's understandable that people would look to Berkshire Hathaway's stock holdings to get inspiration for what to invest in.  Although Berkshire Hathaway holds over 45 stocks, there are two in particular that I love as a long-term buy and hold.
